title: improve deals management
description:
Fix Create Deal button in New Deal popup not working.

Root causes identified and fixed:
1. Button component missing cursor-pointer - Tailwind v4 preflight sets buttons to cursor:default
2. Deal Name field was using controlled input but form state wasn't tracking properly

Changes:
- src/components/ui/button.tsx: Added cursor-pointer and disabled:cursor-not-allowed to button variants
- src/components/CreateDealDialog.tsx: 
  - Changed Deal Name field from controlled to uncontrolled input using useRef
  - Added manual validation for all required fields
  - Removed Zod schema validation since form fields were managed externally
  - Used useId() for unique element IDs

Tested: Successfully created a deal via browser automation, received 201 response from API.
